0.text: Innate: Darius'  damaging basic attacks and abilities apply a stack of Hemorrhage to enemies for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 5 times.
0.html: Innate: Darius' damaging basic attacks and abilities apply a stack of Hemorrhage to enemies for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 5 times.

1.text: Hemorrhage: For each stack, the target is dealt「 13 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% bonus AD) total physical damage over the duration, 」「 3.25 − 7.5 (based on level) (+ 7.5% bonus AD) physical damage every 1.25 seconds over the duration, 」up to a maximum of「 65 − 150 (based on level) (+ 150% bonus AD) total physical damage over the duration. 」「 16.25 − 37.5 (based on level) (+ 37.5% bonus AD) physical damage with each tick. 」Hemorrhage deals 300% damage against  monsters.
1.html: Hemorrhage: For each stack, the target is dealt「 13 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% bonus AD) total physical damage over the duration, 」「 3.25 − 7.5 (based on level) (+ 7.5% bonus AD) physical damage every 1.25 seconds over the duration, 」up to a maximum of「 65 − 150 (based on level) (+ 150% bonus AD) total physical damage over the duration. 」「 16.25 − 37.5 (based on level) (+ 37.5% bonus AD) physical damage with each tick. 」Hemorrhage deals 300% damage against monsters.

2.text: When Darius kills a champion with  Noxian Guillotine, or applies 5 stacks on an enemy  champion, he becomes empowered with Noxian Might for 5 seconds.
2.html: When Darius kills a champion with Noxian Guillotine, or applies 5 stacks on an enemy champion, he becomes empowered with Noxian Might for 5 seconds.
markedPassages: Noxian Guillotine
champion

3.text: Noxian Might: Darius gains 30 − 230 (based on level)  bonus attack damage and instantly applies 5 Hemorrhage stacks through his usual means.
3.html: Noxian Might: Darius gains 30 − 230 (based on level)  bonus attack damage and instantly applies 5 Hemorrhage stacks through his usual means.
markedPassages: bonus attack damage

0.text: Active: Darius hefts his axe for 0.75 seconds, and then swings it around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, reduced to 35% against enemies hit by the handle.
0.html: Active: Darius hefts his axe for 0.75 seconds, and then swings it around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, reduced to 35% against enemies hit by the handle.

1.text: Against champions and large monsters hit, Darius  heals for  13% − 39% (based on enemies hit by the blade) of his missing health. The handle of Darius'  axe will not heal him nor apply nor refresh  Hemorrhage.
1.html: Against champions and large monsters hit, Darius heals for  13% − 39% (based on enemies hit by the blade) of his missing health. The handle of Darius' axe will not heal him nor apply nor refresh Hemorrhage.

0.text: Active: Darius empowers his next basic attack within 4 seconds to have an  uncancellable windup, gain  25 bonus range, deal modified physical damage and  slow the target by 90% for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Darius empowers his next basic attack within 4 seconds to have an uncancellable windup, gain  25 bonus range, deal modified physical damage and slow the target by 90% for 1 second.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup
25 bonus range
slow

1.text: If this attack kills the target, half of Crippling Strike's  cooldown is reduced and its  mana cost is refunded.
1.html: If this attack kills the target, half of Crippling Strike's  cooldown is reduced and its  mana cost is refunded.
markedPassages: cooldown
mana cost
mana cost

2.text: Crippling Strike's total damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
2.html: Crippling Strike's total damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.
markedPassages: critical strike

3.text: Crippling Strike  resets Darius'  basic attack timer.
3.html: Crippling Strike resets Darius' basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Crippling Strike  resets Darius' basic attack timer.

0.html: Passive: Darius gains  armor penetration.
markedPassages: armor penetration

1.text: Active: Darius sweeps his axe in a cone in the target direction, granting  sight of the area for 1 second while  pulling enemies hit towards him. Upon arrival, they rebound 150 units off of him, remaining  airborne and becoming  slowed by 40% for 1 second.
1.html: Active: Darius sweeps his axe in a cone in the target direction, granting sight of the area for 1 second while pulling enemies hit towards him. Upon arrival, they rebound 150 units off of him, remaining airborne and becoming slowed by 40% for 1 second.
markedPassages: sight
pulling
airborne
slowed

2.text: Darius is unable to move or cast  Decimate or  Noxian Guillotine for 0.4 seconds after Apprehend's cast time.
2.html: Darius is unable to move or cast Decimate or Noxian Guillotine for 0.4 seconds after Apprehend's cast time.
markedPassages: Decimate
Noxian Guillotine
possibleConcerningAbilities: Darius is unable to move or cast  Decimate or  Noxian Guillotine for 0.4 seconds after Apprehend's cast time.

0.text: Active: Darius attempts to execute the target enemy  champion,  leaping towards them to deal  true damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on  Hemorrhage stacks), and granting  sight of the area around them for 2.5 seconds from the start of the cast time.
0.html: Active: Darius attempts to execute the target enemy champion, leaping towards them to deal  true damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on Hemorrhage stacks), and granting sight of the area around them for 2.5 seconds from the start of the cast time.
markedPassages: champion
leaping
true damage
0% − 100% (based on Hemorrhage stacks)
sight

1.text: If the target dies within 0.15 seconds after being hit by Noxian Guillotine, Darius  fears nearby  minions and  monsters for 3 seconds, during which they are gradually  slowed by up to 99% over the duration. He can also recast the ability within 20 seconds at no cost, which refreshes on further executions.
1.html: If the target dies within 0.15 seconds after being hit by Noxian Guillotine, Darius fears nearby minions and monsters for 3 seconds, during which they are gradually slowed by up to 99% over the duration. He can also recast the ability within 20 seconds at no cost, which refreshes on further executions.
markedPassages: fears
minions
monsters
slowed

2.text: At rank 3, Noxian Guillotine has no  mana cost and recast timer.
2.html: At rank 3, Noxian Guillotine has no  mana cost and recast timer.

Stats

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Reduces incoming damage from all basic attacks by 12% (excluding turret attacks).

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Stats

+80 health
+6 health per 5 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Endure: After taking damage from a champion or large monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 − 40 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. Reduced to「 66% effectiveness 」「 0 − 26.4 (based on current missing health) 」 on ranged champions or when triggered by area of effect, damage over time, or proc.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Halting Slash: Deal 175% base AD physical damage to enemies in a 450 radius centered around you and slow them by 40% for 3 seconds. Can move while casting (15 (reduced by ability haste) second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – HALTING SLASH: Deal 175% base AD physical damage to enemies in a  450 radius centered around you and  slow them by 40% for 3 seconds. Can move while casting (15 (reduced by ability haste) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants you 20 bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2% bonus movement speed.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+300 health
+45 armor
+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Shipwrecker: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum every 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage on-hit. At maximum stacks, the target is also slowed by 50% for 1 second.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SHIPWRECKER: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum every 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while  immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage on-hit. At maximum stacks, the target is also  slowed by 50% for 1 second.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+350 health
+70 magic resistance
+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ABSORB: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.

Stats

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – The Claws that Catch: Gain bonus attack damage equal to 50% base AD.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, gain a shield equal to 80% of bonus health that decays over 4.5 seconds (60 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THE CLAWS THAT CATCH: Gain bonus attack damage equal to 50% base AD.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 25% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 25% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
